com.idibon.api.model

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idibon.api.model.IdibonHash
      • com.idibon.api.model.Document
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentContent, DocumentContent.Annotated, DocumentContent.Named

    public class Document
extends IdibonHash
implements DocumentContent.Annotated, DocumentContent.Named
    A Document is the basic unit of content in a Collection

      • createAssignment

        public AnnotationBuilder.Assignment createAssignment(Label label,
                                                     int offset,
                                                     int length)
                                              throws IOException
        Add an assignment annotation for a span-scope task to the document.
        Parameters:
        label - The Label to assign. Must be a label in a span-scope task.
        offset - The index of the first character in the document content included in the span.
        length - The length in characters of the span
        Returns:
        AnnotationBuilder to construct additional annotation parameters
        Throws:
        IOException
